meanings.sent1: The arborous forest provided a cool shade on a hot day.
meanings.sent2: The backyard was arborous, with various trees and bushes scattered around.
meanings.sent3: The arborous park was a perfect spot for a game of hide and seek among the trees.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was like an arborous maze, filled with twists and turns of thoughts.
meanings.sent5: The arborous landscape painted a picture of tranquility and natural beauty.

meanings.definition: Resembling or characteristic of a tree.
meanings.sent1: His arborous posture made him stand tall and proud like a tree.
meanings.sent2: The sculpture had an arborous design, with branches extending in all directions.
meanings.sent3: The arborous hat she wore made her look like a walking tree in the forest.
meanings.sent4: Her voice had an arborous quality, deep and resonant like the rustling leaves.
meanings.sent5: The arborous patterns on the fabric gave the dress a natural and earthy feel.

meanings.definition: Consisting of or relating to trees.
meanings.sent1: The arborous ecosystem of the rainforest was teeming with life.
meanings.sent2: The arborous landscape of the countryside was a sight to behold.
meanings.sent3: The arborous decorations at the party created a forest-like atmosphere indoors.
meanings.sent4: His arborous knowledge of trees impressed everyone at the botanical garden.
meanings.sent5: The arborous scent of pine filled the air, transporting them to a woodland paradise.
